newsitem.title: USA: NBC, Yahoo! team up for online chat show.
newsitem.headline: NBC, Yahoo! team up for online chat show.

text.p: Yahoo! Inc and NBC television network on Monday unveiled an online chat show that will feature stars from the network's television show called NBC Live.
Each week NBC Live will feature two live chat sessions with actors appearing on its primetime, daytime dramas, movies and other programs.

"This deal is yet another example of giving consumers what they want in the converging worlds of television and new media," Edmond Sanctis, senior vice president, NBC Digital Productions, said in a statement.
The service will start Saturday, July 19, and regular programs will run twice weekly, Monday through Thursday.
The chat shows will take place on the World Wide Web via Yahoo at www.chat.yahoo.com.
Both NBC and Yahoo plan to promote the show.
Yahoo! shares were up 3-1/4 at 47-1/4 following the news.
NBC is a unit of General Electric Co. It's shares were up 1/8 at 70-3/4.
